rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 17 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 4:44 PM, 07 July 2025(Monday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Bataan, Batangas, Cavite and Rizal within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Tarlac(Concepcion), Pampanga(Magalang), Nueva Ecija(San Antonio, Rizal, Bongabon, General Tinio), Bulacan(Meycauayan, San Jose del Monte), Metro Manila(Caloocan) and Zambales(Botolan, Cabangan, San Narciso, San Antonio, Castillejos, San Felipe, Subic) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
